sentence.Network_en: It is unlikely he would have mistaken hocus-pocus for genuine knowledge.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不可能把骗人的把戏错当成真正的知识。

sentence.Network_en: It is just as likely that he was a charlatan peddling hocus - pocus.
sentence.Network_cn: 他过去恰恰很可能是个挨家挨户行骗的江湖医生.

sentence.Network_en: He was hocus - pocussed artificial diamond ring.
sentence.Network_cn: 他受骗买了一只假钻戒.
